examples: Farmer's cheese adds a delightful creaminess to my morning bowl of granola and fruit.
Cheshire cheese has a unique flavor profile.
Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
Ha, yeah right, and the moon is made of cheese.
Sprinkling Parmesan cheese over pasta dishes adds a savory touch.
words.defineEn: a soft or hard food made from milk that is usually yellow or white in color
words.defineVi: thức ăn mềm hoặc cứng làm từ sữa thường có màu vàng hoặc trắng

examples: The end-of-year accounts show a loss.
Her loss has been keenly felt.
The team's performance is standing on shaky ground after a series of losses.
The company based its projections on shaky ground, leading to financial losses.
The new CEO is making a lot of tough decisions to cut the company’s losses.
words.defineEn: the state or fact of losing someone or something
words.defineVi: tình trạng hoặc thực tế mất một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: The ship is holding a south-easterly course.
The captain navigated the ship through rough waters with skill and expertise.
Our ship changed course.
That ship of yours clearly has had her day.
Jane sure ran a tight ship around here.
words.defineEn: a large boat, used for carrying passengers or goods across the sea
words.defineVi: một chiếc thuyền lớn, được sử dụng để chở hành khách hoặc hàng hóa trên biển

examples: They set a date for a full hearing at the end of February.
I’ll check the dates.
The wedding date is set for next month.
We should mark the date on the calendar for our family gathering.
Her date failed to show.
words.defineEn: a time that is arranged to meet a person with whom one is in a relationship or is likely to be in the future
words.defineVi: một thời gian được sắp xếp để gặp một người mà một người đang có mối quan hệ hoặc có khả năng sẽ có trong tương lai

examples: The fast runner won the race by a wide margin.

My people have a horse in this race, too.
In the Midlands the race remains too close to call.
You lost the race faster than you can say Jack Robinson.
words.defineEn: a competition between people, vehicles, animals, etc. to find out which one is the fastest and finishes first
words.defineVi: cuộc thi giữa người, xe cộ, động vật, v.v. để xem ai nhanh nhất và về đích trước

examples: An ostrich strategy for covid-19 is too risky.
The company abandoned its outdated marketing strategy in favor of a more innovative approach.
Traditional stores are now pursuing a bricks and clicks strategy.
When the company had already lost a major client, the sales team suggested a new strategy.
The company's new strategy seems to be on course, with positive results so far.
words.defineEn: an organized plan made to achieve a goal
words.defineVi: một kế hoạch có tổ chức thực hiện để đạt được một mục tiêu

examples: Fingers crossed!
A successful investor has his finger on the pulse of international business.
she has her fingers in a lot of pies.
She ran her fingers nervously through her hair.
The musician's fingers lightly touched the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
words.defineEn: each of the long thin parts that are connected to our hands, sometimes the thumb is not included
words.defineVi: mỗi phần dài mỏng được nối với bàn tay của chúng tôi, đôi khi không bao gồm ngón tay cái

examples: He makes no bones about his feelings towards the militants.
A fire attack shall chill the enemy to the bone.
Sticks and stones may break my bones, but my positive attitude will never falter.
That chilled me to the bone.
He lined up the bones and set the arm.
words.defineEn: any of the hard pieces making up the skeleton in humans and some animals
words.defineVi: bất kỳ mảnh cứng nào tạo nên bộ xương ở người và một số động vật

examples: The news of her accident hit me like a ton of bricks.
Britain grows 6,000,000 tons of potatoes a year.
It was head over heels for a stuffed giraffe in South Kensington this morning for upside down was the only way the half ton exhibit would go in through the doors of the Natural History Museum.
I mean, tons.
The golden ratio shows up a ton in this painting.
words.defineEn: a unit for measuring weight that is used in the US and is equal to 907.19 kg
words.defineVi: một đơn vị đo trọng lượng được sử dụng ở Mỹ và bằng 907,19 kg

examples: I had experienced the heaven on earth.
The Earth has diverse ecosystems, ranging from forests to deserts.
We spent our vacation in a real heaven on earth.
We live on planet Earth, which is our home.
She's very friendly and very down to earth.
words.defineEn: a big round ball covered in land and water, on which we all live
words.defineVi: một quả bóng tròn lớn bao phủ bởi đất và nước, trên đó tất cả chúng ta sống

examples: The sun always rises in the east.
The sunflower turned its face towards the sun.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
Every light is not the sun.
The children played happily under the sun.
words.defineEn: the large, bright star in the sky that shines during the day and gives us light and heat
words.defineVi: ngôi sao lớn, sáng trên bầu trời tỏa sáng vào ban ngày và cho chúng ta ánh sáng và nhiệt

examples: Ha, yeah right, and the moon is made of cheese.

My boss promised the moon, but never gave me a raise.

The night sky is filled with stars and a beautiful moon.
words.defineEn: the circular object going round the Earth, visible mostly at night
words.defineVi: vật thể hình tròn quay quanh Trái đất, có thể nhìn thấy chủ yếu vào ban đêm

examples: Extreme solutions to problems always lead to difficulties.
The solution was staring me in the face.
A solution finally came home to me as I was falling asleep last night.
We came up with a creative solution to the problem.
We'll have to look for a better solution.
words.defineEn: a way in which a problem can be solved or dealt with
words.defineVi: một cách mà một vấn đề có thể được giải quyết hoặc xử lý

examples: The votes in the swing state may turn the tide in this election.

The vote yesterday appears to mark something of a turning point in the war.

words.defineVi: một sự lựa chọn chính thức của một cá nhân hoặc một nhóm người trong một cuộc họp hoặc cuộc bầu cử

examples: The years of stagnation did a lot of harm to the younger generation.

For generations, people have made furniture out of what was available.

My grandmother's sloe wine recipe has been passed down through generations and is always a hit at family gatherings.
words.defineEn: people born and living at approximately the same period of time
words.defineVi: những người sinh ra và sống gần như cùng một khoảng thời gian

examples: He now rocks a distinguished look with his silver strands.

He's got rocks in his head.

The boat rocked gently as we set sail on a sunny day.
words.defineEn: a piece of rock, standing or projecting above the earth's surface or in the sea
words.defineVi: một mảnh đá, đứng hoặc nhô lên trên bề mặt trái đất hoặc trên biển

examples: These arguments provide the foundation for Simmel's account of the contradictory nature of modern life.
His argument rests on shaky ground.

Your article barely laid a glove on my arguments.
He would start an argument at the drop of a hat.
words.defineEn: a discussion, typically a serious one, between two or more people with different views
words.defineVi: một cuộc thảo luận, điển hình là một cuộc thảo luận nghiêm túc, giữa hai hoặc nhiều người có quan điểm khác nhau

examples: The meeting won't take too much time.

words.defineEn: an event in which people meet, either in person or online, to talk about something
words.defineVi: một sự kiện trong đó mọi người gặp nhau, trực tiếp hoặc trực tuyến, để nói về điều gì đó

examples: er killer was finally put behind bars.
He has raised the bar for other filmmakers.

examples: I was battling my way along the promenade in the teeth of a force ten gale.

he battle lines has been drawn for years.

words.defineVi: một cuộc chiến giữa các lực lượng vũ trang đối lập, đặc biệt là trong một cuộc chiến tranh

examples: That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!

You can spot undercover cops a mile off.
Journalists on the spot reported no progress.
words.defineEn: a small usually round mark that has a different color or texture from the surface it is on

examples: The email went to everyone in the company.
I don't send emails blowing smoke up their asses.

examples: The chocolate mousse had a velvety consistency thanks to carrageen.

he broke off a piece of his chocolate.

examples: Check the remix.

words.defineVi: ‌một mẫu in mà chúng ta có thể viết một số tiền, ký tên và sử dụng thay vì tiền để thanh toán mọi thứ

examples: The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
